title: Welcome
content: Welcome to the new Cadenza blog. We will be using this blog to post regular updates about our forthcoming machine learning challenges and workshops, as well as posts discussing the tools and techniques that we are using in our baseline systems.

title: The 1st Cadenza Challenge
content: The 1st Cadenza Challenge Details to appear

title: Send us an email​
content: You can contact the Clarity Team by email at claritychallengecontact@gmail.com

title: Join the Google group​
content: If you wish to stay updated with Clarity Challenges please sign up the Clarity Challenge’s Google group
